Texts.Eng:
A close relative of the shoggoth, differentiated mainly by their tentacle-like appendages. Rumored to have influence over weaker minds.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Any

  +^green;1920^reset; Breath Time (4 mins)
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Shadow, Cosmic, +^green;10^reset;% Ice
  Enthralling Words: +^green;20^reset;% Charisma
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Slime Bounce, Slime Stick

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Gelatinous and fleshy biomes: Health x^green;1.25^reset;

Texts.Chs:
修格斯的近亲，主要通过触角状的附肢来区分。有传言说对弱者有影响力。

^orange;饮食^reset;：所有的东西

^orange;天赋^reset;：
+^green;1920 ^reset;呼吸时间（4分钟）
 ^green;抗性^reset;：+^green;20 ^reset;%暗影抗性，宇宙射线抗性，+^green;10 ^reset;%冰抗
迷人：+^green;20 ^reset;%魅力
^cyan;免疫^reset;：黏液反弹，黏液粘连
